title: Sri Lanka reunites more than 700 ex-rebels with family after months in rehabilitation camps
content: Source: AP – By Krishan Francis MANIK FARM, Sri Lanka – More than 700 former Tamil Tiger rebels were reunited with family members Saturday after months in rehabilitation camps since the country’s decades-long civil war ended last year. President Mahinda Rajapaksa joined the hands of 15 men, women and children with relatives at a special…
